#id=1
#text=I was walking to my car last night from work and was ready to drive home .
#id=2
#text=I started the car up , but I noticed that I left my phone at work , so I turned the ignition back off , locked the car doors , and shut the driver door .
#id=3
#text=Unfortunately for me , I shut the door WITH my keys still in the ignition .
#id=4
#text=That 's right ; I was locked out of my own car .
#id=5
#text=Flustered and embarassed , I pulled at the handles of the doors and attempted to open the trunk off the car - no luck at all .
#id=6
#text=I walked back to my office , got my phone , and contemplated what I would do next .
#id=7
#text=There was no one there with me , so my only hope was riding the public bus -LRB- I did n't have money for a cab -RRB- .
#id=8
#text=I waited for the bus , the last one of the night , at the bus stop .
#id=9
#text=The bus driver opened the door for me and I came aboard .
#text=I paid the two dollar bus fare so that I could ride and asked him for a transfer so that I could get on the next bus at the terminal .
#text=I took my seat , and the bus took me to the terminal at the plaza .
#text=I got off the bus and hopped on the bus that would take me home .
#text=I handed the transfer to the driver and took my seat .
#text=As I approached my apartment , I pushed the button to request for the bus to stop .
#text=The driver pulled over , and I thanked them and got off .
#text=When I got in the apartment , I immediately jumped into my bed .
#text=I was dead-tired , and though I had the dilemma of having my keys locked in the car , I would figure that out in the morning .
